top_categories.workout_context: 80ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
Edition Zero's New Zealand mountains, South Island gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
At Edition Zero, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Edition Zero's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before November.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Edition Zero. Train it until it feels boring.
8,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 100 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
8,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Edition Zero, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
100 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Two threshold sessions per week without the recovery cost of VO2max work. For 100 miles, sustainable FTP gains matter more than peak power.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Edition Zero’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Edition Zero. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Edition Zero requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on new zealand mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: new zealand mountains, south island gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Durability, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 100 miles of new zealand mountain gravel in South Island, New Zealand.
